import React, { Component } from 'react' import { withRouter } from 'react-modal'; class QuickSearches extends Component { handleClick=(id,name)=>{ const location_id=sessionStorage.getItem('location_id'); if(location_id){ this.props.history.push(`/filter?mealtype=${id}&mealtype_name=${name}&location=${location_id}`); }else{ this.props.history.push(`/filter?mealtype=${id}&mealtype_name=${name}`) } } render() { const {quicksearch} = this.props; return (

Quick Searches

Discover restaurants by type of meal

{quicksearch.map((item) => { return(
this.handleClick(item.mealtype_id,item.name)}>

{item.name}

{item.content}

); })}
) } } {/*
Breakfast
Start your day with exclusive breakfast option
Lunch
Start your day with exclusive lunch option
Snack
Start your day with exclusive Snack option
Dinner
Start your day with exclusive Dinner option
Ice-cream
Start your day with exclusive Ice-cream option
Beverage
Start your day with exclusive beverage option
*/} export default QuickSearches
